column4: How does anybody get any help in this IRC? I haven't gotten an actual answer to any of my problems since Karmic was released
whats the question ?
I'm trying to put fedora on a flash drive, but couldn't on the startup disk creator, someone told me to use netbootin. I downloaded it from the website but it won't run
ok wait ill try to put fedora in
whats the filesystem on the flash drive ?
not sure
its the same flashdrive  i used to put ubuntu on thisnetbok
make sure that: stored in reserved extra space is set to something. like 128 or something
i tried to create without changing it from 0.0 Mb
what?
at the bottom of make startup disk:   u have a bar
try increasing that bar
yeah but the SDC won't even recognize the fedora iso
maybe fedora needs more space for extra files
the fedora site says that i need at least a 1gb stick this one is 8
wow youre right it wont accept it
lets find another usb creator for linux
i found the source for the one fedora says to use but I idont know what to do with it
I'm downloading Unetbootin from the USC
what OS are you on ?
are you on Windows, fedora or Ubuntu ??????????????
here you the fedora usb creator in source
https://fedorahosted.org/releases/l/i/liveusb-creator/liveusb-creator-3.11.0.tar.bz2
